channel.title: How do I add quests to a server?
channel.description: Hello. I am trying to make a server, and I want it to be different from other servers, so I need help with adding quests to the server. I want all of the Free 2 Play quests from the real RuneScape. Is it possible? If so, please reply here! Thank you!

item.title: How do I add quests to a server?
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

[quote=“sng, post:4, topic:287545”][quote author=gon3d34d123 link=topic=380199.msg2858287#msg2858287 date=1247014115]
It will take days, as bobbie said.
But why would you want to add all f2p quest annyway?..
Just sittin 24/7 coding it will just make you angry when you fail…
[/quote]

I just want to try it, no matter how long. I want it to be different, not like every other server on here, if you get what I am saying.[/quote]
yeh i know that…
but are you member on runescape you have to check all the quest’s…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add quests to a server?

@bobbie1990 wrote:

sng:

Hello. I am trying to make a server, and I want it to be different from other servers, so I need help with adding quests to the server. I want all of the Free 2 Play quests from the real RuneScape. Is it possible? If so, please reply here! Thank you!

it will take days to make it…

but if u pay somone good they maybe make one for you ;D
